comments:
Description:
[2.2.1]The report that contain library xtab and set filter cannot be run

Step:
1.New a library and add a xtab
2.New a report and use the library
3.Drop the xtab from library explorer into layout
4.Set the filter on the xtab that is in report
5.Preview

Actual result:
It pop up an error said that the report cannot be run
This bug also happen when add a sorting.

Seems that the design file with filter/sort in report item from library not right. Please see the exceptions.

re-assign to model for deep research.


- The design file file:/D:/runtime-workspace/test/2.2.1/197261/test_lib.rptdesign has error and can not be run.
